member_organisations:
Africa: Darfur United, Zanzibar, Chagos Island, Somaliland, Barawa, Matabeleland, Western Sahara 
Asia: Arameans Suryoye, Kurdistan, Panjab, Tamil Eelam, Lezghian, Ryukyu, Tibet, FC Korea, Uyghur 
Europe: Abkhazia, County of Nice, Delvidek, Donetsk PR, Ellan Vannin, Felvidek, Franconia, Greenland, Heligoland, Karpatalya, Luhansk PR,  Monaco, Nagorno Karabakh, Northern Cyprus, Occitania, Padania, Raetia, Romani people, Sapmi, Skåneland, Szekely Land, South Ossetia,  Transnistria, Western Armenia 
North America: Quebec, Cascadia 
Oceania: Kiribati, Tuvalu 
Read more at http://www.conifa.org
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Digital economy and society, Sport, Communication
eu_initiatives: Social integration, sports, culture, transparency, integration, peace, projects and youth exchange.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
ISCA - International Sport and Culture Association 
www.isca-web.org
relevant_communication: Hosting the 3rd edition of CONIFA World Football Cup 2018 in London, 31 May - 9 June with participating ethnicities from 65 continents. Sports & Cultural activities during the period of time.
goals__remit:
With high ethical standards and dedicated members CONIFA is the world leading organization for people, nations and sportingly isolated regions whom share the joy of playing international football. CONIFA contributes to the enhancement of global relations and international understanding 
 
CONIFA aims to build bridges between people, nations, minorities and isolated regions all over the world through friendship, culture and the joy of playing football. CONIFA works for the development of affiliated members and is committed to fair play and the eradication of racism.
